resources.string: The Lost City: A Short Text-based Adventure Game
As you trek into the jungle, you came across two paths. Which path will you choose?
Warning proceed with caution. DANGER AHEAD!!!
You pray to the Jungle Deity and your prayers have been answered! Pick one.
You have encountered a quicksand. What will you do?
You are dead... your adventure ends here x.x
You have obtain an ancient sword, blessed by the Jungle Deity...
You have obtain a magic rope, blessed by the Jungle Deity...
You found a relic, it tells you to go back and find another path!
You have encounter a hostile tribe.. They felt threaten and attack you. What will you do?
You stumble upon an secret entrance! Looks like its locked... What will you do?
You have triggered a trap, You are dead... your adventure ends here x.x
Congratulation! You found the lost treasure and become rich beyond your wildest dreams ^^
